page.title: 18GOLF IN OUR AREA : MSC GRANT
page.content:
Scots have a commitment to{GOLF}as a leisure pursuit.Monifieth Courses were laid more than a century ago-the Medal -Ashludie and a recent practice ground Both 18 holes,the Medal is used for qualifying rounds in the "Open"."Lucky Daddy"-6th,13th-"Pyramids",and "18th Ian Hutcheon"are names of some holes. Members'Clubs-Abertay,Broughty,Grange+ Dundee,Monifieth and Panmure Ladies.
Manpower Service Commission Grants finance employment and overheads for unemployed youngsters.Qualified men help them undertake jobs to meet the needs of the community.The Shop Front opposite Invertay is a Drop-in Centre for the unemployed where coffee-bar, pool and table-tennis are available. To leave school or further education with no prospect of work is no joy.The economy+modern technology share blame.
